reviews.text: One of the best Pizza Huts in the area. First folks in so the buffet wasn’t completely out yet. Though the food that was, was absolutely delicious & hot. Staff was friendly & on top of things. Restaurant was pretty clean & well organized.
SO so ummy...and I love supporting young readers -- thanks, Hut! ...did I mention how very yummy the pizza was? Seriously. Good pizza 🥰
Love their pizza! It's the best anywhere. The service at this one is amazing, too!
Food was good and so was the service. Waitress was great also!
Pizza hut has been always the best pizza and love the salads and sauces. Great services as well.
Hermoso lugar para visitar en familia y de paseo. Es un lugar histórico.

reviews.author_name: Centro de Terapias de Alternativa Paz

reviews.text: This is probably one my favorite museums EVER. Worth the trip. I saw so many interesting things and loved watching the scientists. My entire family had a great time.
Beautifully done revision! The new museum is displaying some exhibits that the old museum couldn't due to lack of space.  Well done, U of M!

super cool place to visit if you are in ann arbor. Budget  friendly. They have everything  from rocks and minerals, dinosaurs, animals, and space exhibits  in such a pretty  building. This is a great stop for a family  day

Update question: will the new museum have a KID friendly plannaterium or will they be just as rude to kids as they always have been? 

We like the museum but the planetarium I want to warn you is NOT kid friendly or shall say the people giving presentations. My 5 year old was completely amazed by it, I wouldn’t have brought him in if he was loud to disrupt anyone, he said ooh wow cool in a normal talking not loud voice because he was amazed by it and the rude guy presenting scolded him twice to be quiet that it’s disruptive and s third time he signaled to my son to zip it again when he was whispering to me to look at something that interested him so my son couldn’t be excited to learn here and couldn’t even whisper.. actually the presenter was louder when scolding my son so he was the one being disruptive. Apparently kids can’t go in and be amazed at what they see or well express it for that matter. It’s not like he was acting up, screaming or throwing a tantrum because I would have walked him out if he was plus he wasn’t continuously talking which we understood plus he understood not to talk when someone else is talking but a quick expression of excitement a couple times from a child is to be expected.  I think this was the worst experience we have had here and won’t be back because of it. Kids can’t be excited to learn here which is sad. Here is a tip, don’t hire people who are not kid friendly. We were sitting closest to the man presenting at the time which is why he was able to hear him at all.  After the show we had a couple other people approach us and complimented how adorable our son was and that it was great as to how amazed he was and how rude the student was giving the presentation. Why is this even acceptable here?

He really has his heart set on working for NASA when he gets big and sure he may change his mind as many and most do but kids shouldn’t have their love for something crushed due to some uptight people. I would love if someone could contact me about this issue.. to make it known this review was noticed by someone at the museum would be little more comforting maybe
There are big windows looking right in to observe the scientists working on huge jaw bones and other skeletons. Very cool! Worth visiting.
Situated in the heart of city.Awesome place to hangout with friends. Friends can sit together for long time . Burgers are awesome in taste. All food items are good in taste.
Love to come here, after my coaching classes. It is very nice place for sitting with friends
Well !!!! Who doesn’t know abt Mcdonald 😄❤️ and i think 90% foodies will prefer to take a quick hunger break here. I request those 10% to fill the gap sooner the better 🔥 🔥🔥

It is situated in the Atlantis mall Civil lines......Prayagraj...... 
You all are well aware of the fact that it is a place mostly crowded.... it promotes self service.... the menu is being displayed on the screen above counters.... very limited items are there in this mcD Allahabad...  but it will be freshly prepared and served hot.... drinking water is available for free but one have to ask for it..... its affordable...... one cannot have a cosy atmosphere or a silent atmosphere since its generally over crowded....

I recommend you to taste ice creams...

I would prefer KFC for burgers. But if u want something lite than you ho for it.
The place is always crowded. Try the mcflurry and allu ticki
The sandwich was a mess when i opened it up. Sauce was spilling out.
Good food, good service, good price

New management has done an amazing job taking this location to the next level.  Service is top notch and the food quality has improved exponentially!  Speed of service is noticably faster.  Definitely will be having more quick lunches here in the near future!
Agree! Food quality has gotten so much better since the old owner sold it.
Very friendly/polite staff!
Disappointingly small and not focused enough on the migration of the Serbs, interaction with other Slavic / Balkan cultures. On the other hand, super inexpensive (~$4USD
A great collocation of national heritage and costumes of all regions! Recommended for Slavists especially!
This museum was recently renovated. We visited 2 weeks ago and loved it.
Beautiful.different periods of culture,life,.on english too.water,toilet,very important.

This museum has clothes, tools, furniture, and recreations of living spaces of Serbian people from the past. They're still working on exhibits today so it's not fully functional completely right now but there are still many things to see in the upper levels.
Good place to go any day of the week.
Very friendly, welcoming and helpful congregation
Great congregation, family friendly and loving. Bible based on all they do and teach.
Some truly awesome believers!
